title: Watch: Mathieu Bélanger-Barrette’s Gravel Traverse of Eastern Canada’s Gaspé Peninsula
content:
The French-Canadian off-road cyclist set a cycling FKT of the new route, which he hopes will inspire others to visit the region and ride.

Read the full article at Watch: Mathieu Bélanger-Barrette’s Gravel Traverse of Eastern Canada’s Gaspé Peninsula on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
